name: countries-in-the-world
description:
I built this project for the Frontend Mentor Challenge REST Countries API with color theme switcher

This application was built with React, and uses the REST Countries API to retrieve and display data from countries worldwide. Search for a specific country based on a name string, and / or filter results by region. Click on a country card to display more detailed information about that country, including bordering countries (which you may also click to display detailed information about that country)

I hope you enjoy using it!

Dependences: React / React-DOM, Reach Router, Material-UI/Core, Material-UI/Icons

Build: run "npm run build"
Deploy: run "npm run start"
